project.name: C-C078B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C078B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Read a string from the input. Check first if it has any command separators and then run it though a URL decoding algorithm. Then use this string to perform an nslookup by appending it to the end of the command. This allows the user to run arbitrary commands by suplying command separators encoded in url encoding.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="10" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C078B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT04-DF12-CF22-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Read a string from the input. Check first if it has any command separators and then run it though a URL decoding algorithm. Then use this string to perform an nslookup by appending it to the end of the command. This allows the user to run arbitrary commands by suplying command separators encoded in url encoding.
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="10" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
